articles.title: ​Honda Civic Breaks Record By Going From 0 To 60mph In 1.1 Seconds - LADbible
articles.description: The car broke the AWD Honda quarter-mile record at the Haltech World Cup Finals a few months back
articles.content:
A Honda Civic has broken records by travelling 0-60mph in just 1.1 seconds during a quarter-mile run at the Haltech World Cup Finals.
The car broke the AWD (All-Wheel Drive) Honda quarter-mile record at Maryland International Raceway at the event a few month… [+2101 chars]

articles.title: Google’s Search app finally has a dark mode - Engadget
articles.description: Dark mode will soon be available for the Google Search app on Android 10, iOS 12 and iOS 13.
articles.content: 2019 was the year of the dark mode. It’s now 2020, and in a “better late than never” move, Google is finally rolling out a light-on-dark option for its Search app. Dark mode starts rolling out today and will come to more and more phones throughout the week, s… [+645 chars]
